attributes.action: require that Sir Fred Goodwin collect his pension in person, paid in pennies, at a publicised place and time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir Fred Goodwin's obscene £700,000 p.a. pension, if it cannot be withheld, should be paid to him in person, in pennies, at a pre-announced time and place, so that the general public may attend and show their disapproval.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
